Literature.Title: Antimicrobial Activity of Snake B-Defensins and Derived Peptides
Literature.Author: Oguiura N, Corrêa PG, Rosmino IL, de Souza AO, Pasqualoto KFM

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=>113µM),Micrococcus luteus A270(MIC=28.4µM),Citrobacter freundii(MIC=>113µM),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=>113µM),Providencia rettgeri(no activity data),Serratia marcescens(no activity data),Morganella morganii(no activity data),Klebsiella pneumoniae(no activity data)
